mapper.select: SELECT b.*, (CASE WHEN SYSDATE < b.EVENT_START_DATE THEN '진행예정' WHEN (SYSDATE >= b.EVENT_START_DATE AND SYSDATE < b.EVENT_END_DATE) THEN '진행중' ELSE '종료' END) AS event_progress FROM TEAMB_EVENT b WHERE b.event_num > 0
